RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: Instruments
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description: A set of tools for basic armor upgrades.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: Robotic manipulators
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description:
A set of robotic manipulators to simplify the repair and modernization of armor. They are designed to provide a more detailed improvement in armor due to a special artificial intelligence.
Allow you to install a second level of modules for armor.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: Nanorobots
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description:
Liquid enriched with specially programmed nanorobots for very fine work. Moreover, due to their size and type of fluid, they can penetrate where people cannot.
Opens the last level of modules for armor.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: Condenser batteries
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description: A battery pack that slowly accumulates energy. Used as a secondary station power supply. Charges armor when the station is not connected to the main power source (if there is a charge). Charges when the power to the station is active. \n\nThe slowest and low-capacity batteries.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: 'Nano-yolk' high capacity
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description: The hollow shell of titanium dioxide, inside which (like the yolk in the egg) is a filler of aluminum powder, sulfuric acid and titanium oxysulfate. The size of the filler can vary regardless of the shell. The use of such particles allowed a three-fold increase in the capacity of the batteries, and significantly reduce the charging speed.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: Transformers
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description: A step-up transformer with a winding of steel allows you to increase the speed of charging armor.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: Energy cell
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description: Energy cell accumulating a small amount of energy and radiating with increased power. Provides increased armor charging speed.

RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.label: Power accelerator
RimArmorCore.Mk1.MKStationModuleDef.description: Accelerator and enricher charged particles. Increases the speed of charging armor, and thanks to a special design allows you to activate power overload to use the maximum power (attention: explosive!)
